mapper.sql: uuid, effective_date, supplier_name, corporate_address, supplier_chain_manager, supplier_chain_contact, phone, email, temperature_code, bid_category, general_supplier_comments, product_costing, lowest_product_cost, product_uom, freight_uom, published_freight_rates, pickup_allowances, freight_different, supplier_comments_freight, minimum_delivery, minimum_pickup, minimum_different, delivery_pickup_period, fuel_surcharge_period, additional_fees, compliance_shipper_count, current_pallet_program, supplier_comments_profile, truckload_maximum_weight, truckload_maximum_cubes, truckload_maximum_cases, truckload_maximum_pallets, rail_maximum_weight, rail_maximum_cubes, rail_maximum_cases, rail_maximum_pallets, created_date, created_time, modified_date, modified_time, modified_by, last_uploaded_date, last_date_of_full_review, next_review_due_date,deleted, created_by, bracket1_header, bracket2_header, bracket3_header, bracket4_header, bracket5_header, bracket6_header, bracket7_header, bracket8_header, brackets_uom, business_center, corp_billed, true_fob_supplier
mapper.select:
select si.supplier_name vendorName, group_concat(a.sysco_suvc) vendorId, si.last_uploaded_date lastUploadedDate, si.last_date_of_full_review lastDateOfFullReview, si.supplier_chain_manager supplierChainManager, si.business_center businessCenter, si.corp_billed corpBilled, si.true_fob_supplier trueFobSupplier, si.next_review_due_date nextReviewDueDate from SUPPLIER_INFO si join SUPPLIER_SYSCO_SUVC a on si.uuid = a.ref_uuid WHERE 1=1
and si.supplier_name like '%' #{vendorName} '%'
and si.supplier_chain_manager like '%' #{supplierChainManager} '%'
and si.business_center like '%' #{businessCenter} '%'
and si.corp_billed like '%' #{corpBilled} '%'
and si.true_fob_supplier like '%' #{trueFobSupplier} '%'
and DATE_FORMAT(si.last_uploaded_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= #{lastUploadedDateBegin}
and #{lastUploadedDateEnd} >= DATE_FORMAT(si.last_uploaded_date,'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(si.last_date_of_full_review,'%Y-%m-%d') >= #{lastDateOfFullReviewBegin}
and #{lastDateOfFullReviewEnd} >= DATE_FORMAT(si.last_date_of_full_review,'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(si.next_review_due_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= #{nextReviewDueDateBegin}
and #{nextReviewDueDateEnd} >= DATE_FORMAT(si.next_review_due_date,'%Y-%m-%d')
AND si.deleted = 'N' -- AND DATE_FORMAT(si.effective_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY si.supplier_name
ORDER BY ${sort} ${order}
ORDER BY si.supplier_name ASC
select distinct si.file_url docName from SUPPLIER_FILE_URL si where uuid in (select uuid from SUPPLIER_INFO where supplier_name= #{vendorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select b.supplier_name vendorName,b.uuid vendorNumber, b.additional_fees additionalFees, b.bid_category bidCategory,b.freight_uom freightUom,b.effective_date effectiveDate,b.pickup_allowances pickupAllowances, b.compliance_shipper_count complianceShipperCount, b.corporate_address corporateAddress,b.current_pallet_program currentPalletProgram, b.delivery_pickup_period deliveryPickupPeriod,b.email email,b.freight_different freightDifferent, b.fuel_surcharge_period fuelSurchargePeriod,b.general_supplier_comments generalSupplierComments, b.lowest_product_cost lowestProductCost,b.minimum_delivery minimumDelivery,b.minimum_different minimumDifferent, b.minimum_pickup minimumPickup,b.temperature_code temperatureCode, b.phone Phone,b.product_costing productCosting,b.product_uom productUom,b.published_freight_rates publishedFreightRates, b.supplier_chain_contact supplierChainContact,b.supplier_chain_manager supplierChainManager, b.supplier_comments_freight supplierCommentsFreight,b.supplier_comments_profile supplierCommentsProfile, b.rail_maximum_cases rail_maximum_cases,b.rail_maximum_cubes rail_maximum_cubes, b.rail_maximum_pallets rail_maximum_pallets,b.rail_maximum_weight rail_maximum_weight, b.truckload_maximum_cases truckload_maximum_cases,b.truckload_maximum_cubes truckload_maximum_cubes, b.truckload_maximum_pallets truckload_maximum_pallets,b.truckload_maximum_weight truckload_maximum_weight from SUPPLIER_INFO b where b.uuid IN (select ref_uuid from SUPPLIER_SYSCO_SUVC where sysco_suvc = #{vendorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select supplier_contract_no id,contract_exception contractException FROM SUPPLIER_CONTRACT_EXCEPTION where uuid IN (select ref_uuid from SUPPLIER_SYSCO_SUVC where sysco_suvc = #{vendorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and deleted = 'N'

select ship_point_no id,city city,dc_plant dcPlant,drop_trailer dropTrailer,physical_address_zone physicalAddressZone, rail_facilities railFacilities,sourced_product sourcedProduct,state state,zip_code zipCode FROM SUPPLIER_LOCATION where uuid IN (select ref_uuid from SUPPLIER_SYSCO_SUVC where sysco_suvc = #{vendorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and deleted = 'N'
select file_url fileUrl FROM SUPPLIER_FILE_URL where uuid IN (select ref_uuid from SUPPLIER_SYSCO_SUVC where sysco_suvc = #{vendorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select
from SUPPLIER_INFO where supplier_name = #{supplierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND deleted = 'N'

select
from SUPPLIER_INFO where supplier_name like '%' #{supplierName} '%'
mapper.insert: insert into SUPPLIER_INFO (uuid, effective_date, supplier_name, corporate_address, supplier_chain_manager, supplier_chain_contact, phone, email, temperature_code, bid_category, truckload_maximum_weight, truckload_maximum_cubes, truckload_maximum_cases, truckload_maximum_pallets, rail_maximum_weight, rail_maximum_cubes, rail_maximum_cases, rail_maximum_pallets, created_date, created_time, modified_date, modified_time, modified_by, last_uploaded_date, last_date_of_full_review, next_review_due_date, deleted, created_by, bracket1_header, bracket2_header, bracket3_header, #{bracketsUom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessCenter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corpBilled,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trueFobSupplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update SUPPLIER_INFO
effective_date = #{effectiveDate,jdbcType=DATE},
supplier_name = #{supplierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
corporate_address = #{corporateAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supplier_chain_manager = #{supplierChainManager,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supplier_chain_contact = #{supplierChainContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
temperature_code = #{temperatureCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bid_category = #{bidCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
general_supplier_comments = #{generalSupplierComments,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_costing = #{productCosting,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lowest_product_cost = #{lowestProductCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_uom = #{productUom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
freight_uom = #{freightUom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
published_freight_rates = #{publishedFreightRates,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pickup_allowances = #{pickupAllowances,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
freight_different = #{freightDifferent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supplier_comments_freight = #{supplierCommentsFreight,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
minimum_delivery = #{minimumDelivery,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
minimum_pickup = #{minimumPickup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
minimum_different = #{minimumDifferent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
delivery_pickup_period = #{deliveryPickupPeriod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fuel_surcharge_period = #{fuelSurchargePeriod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
additional_fees = #{additionalFees,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
compliance_shipper_count = #{complianceShipperCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
current_pallet_program = #{currentPalletProgram,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supplier_comments_profile = #{supplierCommentsProfile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
truckload_maximum_weight = #{truckloadMaximumWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
truckload_maximum_cubes = #{truckloadMaximumCubes,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
truckload_maximum_cases = #{truckloadMaximumCases,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
truckload_maximum_pallets = #{truckloadMaximumPallets,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
rail_maximum_weight = #{railMaximumWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
rail_maximum_cubes = #{railMaximumCubes,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
rail_maximum_cases = #{railMaximumCases,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
rail_maximum_pallets = #{railMaximumPallets,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
created_date = #{createdDate,jdbcType=DATE},
created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modified_date = #{modifiedDate,jdbcType=DATE},
modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modified_by = #{modifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_uploaded_date = #{lastUploadedDate,jdbcType=DATE},
last_date_of_full_review = #{lastDateOfFullReview,jdbcType=DATE},
next_review_due_date = #{nextReviewDueDate,jdbcType=DATE},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bracket1_header = #{bracket1Header,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bracket2_header = #{bracket2Header,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bracket3_header = #{bracket3Header,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bracket4_header = #{bracket4Header,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bracket5_header = #{bracket5Header,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bracket6_header = #{bracket6Header,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bracket7_header = #{bracket7Header,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bracket8_header = #{bracket8Header,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brackets_uom = #{bracketsUom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
business_center = #{businessCenter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
corp_billed = #{corpBilled,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
true_fob_supplier = #{trueFobSupplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update SUPPLIER_INFO set effective_date = #{effectiveDate,jdbcType=DATE}, supplier_name = #{supplierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, corporate_address = #{corporateAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supplier_chain_manager = #{supplierChainManager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supplier_chain_contact = #{supplierChainContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, temperature_code = #{temperatureCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bid_category = #{bidCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, general_supplier_comments = = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
